mapper.update: UPDATE tb_scheduler_lock SET owner_id = #{ownerId}, lease_until_utc = #{leaseUntilUtc}, fencing_token = fencing_token + 1, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE lock_key = #{lockKey} AND (lease_until_utc <= #{nowUtc} OR owner_id = #{ownerId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_scheduler_lock( lock_key, owner_id, lease_until_utc, fencing_token, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{lockKey}, #{ownerId}, #{leaseUntilUtc}, 1, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT table_name, retention_days, enabled FROM tb_data_retention_policy ORDER BY table_name ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_data_retention_run( id, table_name, started_at, status, trace_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{tableName}, #{startedAt}, #{status}, #{traceId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
